item.title: Coronavirus FAQ: I didn't get the latest COVID vaccine. Should I? And if so ... when?
item.description: If you haven't rolled up your sleeve for the jab, you're not alone. In fact, you're in the majority. Here's why doctors think the shot is important.

item.title: A body has been found in the search for a woman missing near a Pennsylvania sinkhole

item.title: She's 74 — and expecting: Wisdom the albatross astounds once again
item.description: It started in the Eisenhower era: Every year, Wisdom, a Layan albatross, has returned to her nesting grounds on the Midway Atoll in the Pacific Ocean.

item.title: This little electric car made history. 25 years ago, GM stopped making it
item.description: The EV1 was the first modern, mass-produced electric vehicle from a major automaker — pioneering some technologies you can still find in today's EVs. ...

item.title: After trying to impose martial law, South Korea's president faces an impeachment vote
item.description: After President Yoon Suk Yeol's failed attempt to impose martial law, South Korea's parliament will vote Saturday on his impeachment. Yoon's own party...
